attributes.action: pressure the television companies to bring back"Supergran"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With our gradually ageing population it is important to realise that old people are not boring, and have a valuable role to play in society. 
Supergran was a classic childrens show originally aired on CITV in the mid 1980s, starring a granny with amazing powers. Showing Supergran on our screens will not only entertain the masses, it will also educate our youngsters that old people have the potential to be fun and exciting.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
